page.title: 16Trade in the Twyford Area
page.content: The only shop in our block is at Twyford.It is a well stocked grocery plus fresh fruit and vegetables and some hardware.Incorporated in the shop is the Post Office.The shop is an important amenity for the older residents and people without their own transport.Most other people use it for small amounts of shopping but do their main shopping at Supermarkets in nearby towns. The block is also served by the following mobile shops which call once weekly:Butcher,Grocer,Fish Monger. In addition a mobile fish and chip van tours the area once or twice a week.Flour and animal feedstuffs can be bought from Three Bridge Mill.Meals i.e.lunch,dinner and snacks can be purchased at the village pubs(Inns).
